keyMoments.title: Tsumegeri Guard Leader Drinks Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Hyota, the muscular leader of the Tsumegeri Guards with a large chin, drinks Hero Water along with his fellow guards to gain temporary superhuman strength to fight Crocodile.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance and ultimate sacrifice of a loyal Alabasta royal guard.

keyMoments.title: Death from Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Hyota dies along with the other Tsumegeri Guards after the five-minute effect of Hero Water expires.
keyMoments.significance: Tragic death showing the ultimate sacrifice for Alabasta.

abilities.description: Temporary superhuman strength gained from drinking Hero Water, lasting five minutes before causing death.

reveals.information: Willing to die using Hero Water to protect King Cobra from Crocodile

keyMoments.title: Tsumegeri Guard Drinks Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Brahm, a tall hunchbacked member of the Tsumegeri Guards, drinks Hero Water to fight Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Death from Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Brahm dies from Hero Water's effects after five minutes.
keyMoments.significance: Tragic death of a loyal guard.

abilities.description: Temporary superhuman strength from Hero Water.

keyMoments.title: Tsumegeri Guard Drinks Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Arrow, a thin guard with a pointed chin, drinks Hero Water to fight Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Death from Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Arrow dies from Hero Water's effects.
keyMoments.significance: Dies attempting to protect his king.

abilities.description: Temporary superhuman strength from Hero Water.

keyMoments.title: Tsumegeri Guard Drinks Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Barrel, a bulky rotund guard, drinks Hero Water to fight Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Death from Hero Water
keyMoments.description: Barrel dies from Hero Water's effects.
keyMoments.significance: Dies in service to his kingdom.

abilities.description: Temporary superhuman strength from Hero Water.

keyMoments.title: Jackal Transformation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Chaka transforms into his jackal form using the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal, revealing his Devil Fruit powers for the first time. He attacks Crocodile with his technique Howling Fangs.
keyMoments.significance: First on-screen demonstration of Chaka's Devil Fruit abilities, establishing him as one of Alabasta's guardian deities.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Despite his Devil Fruit powers, Chaka is easily defeated by Crocodile's Logia abilities and left bloodied on the palace grounds.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the futility of fighting a Logia user without knowing their weakness.

abilities.description: Transforms into a jackal or human-jackal hybrid form, granting enhanced strength, speed, and senses.
Chaka transforms fully into jackal form, places his sword in his mouth, and charges at opponents with slashing strikes.

reveals.information: Possesses the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal Devil Fruit
One of Alabasta's two guardian deities (representing Anubis)

keyMoments.title: Learns the Truth About Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Koza arrives at the palace and learns from Vivi that Crocodile is the mastermind behind Alabasta's drought and civil war, not King Cobra.
keyMoments.significance: Critical revelation that changes Koza's entire understanding of the conflict.

keyMoments.title: Raises White Flags to End War
keyMoments.description: After learning the truth and being warned about the bomb, Koza and the royal army raise white flags to stop the rebellion and save both armies.
keyMoments.significance: Koza's desperate attempt to end the violence and save Alabasta.

keyMoments.title: Shot by Baroque Works Agents
keyMoments.description: As Koza proclaims peace to the rebels, he is shot multiple times from behind by disguised Baroque Works agents, sabotaging the peace attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Tragic moment showing Koza's willingness to sacrifice himself for peace and Crocodile's thorough manipulation.

relationships.description: Childhood friends who grew up together in Alabasta. Despite being on opposite sides of the civil war, they still trust each other.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi reveals the truth about Crocodile to Koza, and he immediately believes her and acts to stop the war.

reveals.information: Willing to immediately end the rebellion upon learning the truth, showing his true goal was justice for Alabasta

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Fight Tsumegeri Guards
keyMoments.description: Crocodile coldly refuses to fight the Hero Water-enhanced Tsumegeri Guards, simply waiting for them to die from the poison's effects.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's ruthlessness and tactical superiority.
keyMoments.quote: I won't bother to fight them since they're going to die anyway.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Chaka
keyMoments.description: Crocodile easily defeats Chaka despite his Devil Fruit transformation, using his sand powers to avoid and counter all attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Further establishes Crocodile as an overwhelming force in Alabasta.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Operation Utopia to Koza
keyMoments.description: Crocodile openly boasts about his manipulation of both the rebels and royal army, revealing his scheme to Koza.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Crocodile's arrogance and confidence in his plan's success.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Truth to Koza
keyMoments.description: Vivi reveals to Koza that Crocodile is the true mastermind behind Alabasta's suffering, finally exposing the truth to the rebel leader.
keyMoments.significance: Critical moment where Vivi shares the truth with someone who can help stop the war.

keyMoments.title: Commands Royal Army to Surrender
keyMoments.description: Vivi commands the royal army to raise white flags and surrender to the rebels to stop the fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's willingness to sacrifice royal pride to save lives.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Koza's Shooting
keyMoments.description: Vivi watches in horror as Koza is shot by Baroque Works agents, destroying their attempt at peace.
keyMoments.significance: Devastating moment as Vivi's peace efforts are sabotaged.

relationships.description: Childhood friends who trust each other despite the civil war.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi reveals the truth about Crocodile to Koza, trusting him to help stop the war.
